publicKey.description: The public key text in the OpenSSH format. The algorithm must be specified in case of the legacy X.509 keys

permission.description: The permission required to delete repositories. Must be one of: "SYS_ADMIN", "ADMIN", "PROJECT_ADMIN", "REPO_ADMIN".

details.description: Details about the last index attempt for the given repository

indexingError.description: Additional detail about the BROKEN status if available, meant for informational purposes only. This nullable, free-form text field should not be used for automation; rely on status instead.

lastIndexedCommitId.description: The commit hash of the last indexed commit in the repository.

lastIndexedTimestamp.description: The timestamp in epoch milliseconds of the last time the repository successfully was indexed

projectKey.description: The project key that the repository belongs to

status.description: The current indexing status of the repository.

repository.description: The repository which has entered a broken status

RestIndexEvent.description: The event that is currently being processed by the indexing worker.

eventMetadata.description: Retrieves the metadata associated with the index event. The content of this metadata is variable and depends on the event type. It may include identifiers such as repository ID, project ID, or user ID, among other relevant details.

eventType.description: Retrieves the type of the event, indicating the entity (such as project, repository, or user) that triggered the indexing operation.

retries.description: Retrieves the count of how many times this event has been retried due to previous failures or exceptions.

RestIndexEventMetadata.description: Retrieves the metadata associated with the index event. The content of this metadata is variable and depends on the event type. It may include identifiers such as repository ID, project ID, or user ID, among other relevant details.

RestIndexingProcess.description: A snapshot of the current process being executed by the indexing worker.

currentTask.description: The current task description that the indexing worker is executing.

event.description: The event that is currently being processed by the indexing worker.

eventMetadata.description: Retrieves the metadata associated with the index event. The content of this metadata is variable and depends on the event type. It may include identifiers such as repository ID, project ID, or user ID, among other relevant details.

eventType.description: Retrieves the type of the event, indicating the entity (such as project, repository, or user) that triggered the indexing operation.

retries.description: Retrieves the count of how many times this event has been retried due to previous failures or exceptions.

capturedAt.description: Returns the timestamp indicating when the current thread details were captured.

currentProcess.description: A snapshot of the current process being executed by the indexing worker.

currentTask.description: The current task description that the indexing worker is executing.

event.description: The event that is currently being processed by the indexing worker.

eventMetadata.description: Retrieves the metadata associated with the index event. The content of this metadata is variable and depends on the event type. It may include identifiers such as repository ID, project ID, or user ID, among other relevant details.

eventType.description: Retrieves the type of the event, indicating the entity (such as project, repository, or user) that triggered the indexing operation.

retries.description: Retrieves the count of how many times this event has been retried due to previous failures or exceptions.

delayedQueueSize.description: The number of items in the delayed queue. This queue contains retries that have been scheduled with an exponential backoff delay. The retries are for operations that previously failed in the main queue.

queueSize.description: The number of items currently in the main queue.

state.description: Represents the state of an indexing thread.

code.description: The current code representing the state of the indexing thread

description.description: Additional detail about the current state, meant for informational purposes only.

RestIndexingThreadState.description: Represents the state of an indexing thread.

code.description: The current code representing the state of the indexing thread

description.description: Additional detail about the current state, meant for informational purposes only.

gracefulShutdown.description: Should the indexing thread terminate immediately

waitForRestart.description: Should the response wait until the worker has been restarted

indexingError.description: Additional detail about the BROKEN status if available, meant for informational purposes only. This nullable, free-form text field should not be used for automation; rely on status instead.

lastIndexedCommitId.description: The commit hash of the last indexed commit in the repository.

lastIndexedTimestamp.description: The timestamp in epoch milliseconds of the last time the repository successfully was indexed

projectKey.description: The project key that the repository belongs to

status.description: The current indexing status of the repository.

capturedAt.description: The timestamp indicating when the current queue details were captured.

nodeId.description: The ID of the node associated with the indexing queue.

queued.description: Indicates whether the repository is currently queued for indexing.

queuedAt.description: Gets the time at which the repository was added to the indexing queue. If the repository is not present in the queue, this will be empty.

sourceBranch.description: The starting point for branch. If provided and different from branch, branch will be created as a new branch, branching off from sourceBranch.

sourceCommitId.description: The commit ID of the file before it was edited, used to identify if content has changed. Or null if this is a new file
